description: This file defines a Flutter widget called NoteSearchBar, which provides a debounced search input field with customizable initial text, hint text, and search callback. It manages a TextEditingController and a Timer to debounce search input, updating the parent widget after a delay.

classes.name: NoteSearchBar
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a search input field with debounce functionality. It takes initial text, a callback for search changes, and hint text.

classes.name: _NoteSearchBarState
classes.description: State class for NoteSearchBar that manages the TextEditingController and debounce timer, building the TextField UI and handling user input.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the controller with initial text and sets up the listener for text changes.

methods.name: _onChanged
methods.description: Cancels the existing debounce timer and sets a new one to call the search callback after 300ms of inactivity.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cancels the debounce timer and disposes the TextEditingController.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI, which is a TextField with decoration and icons that interacts with the controller.
